skillTree.localised_description: The power to move objects without touching them makes missiles attacks against this one largely pointless.
Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: The power of the Old Ones, stored for future use so that - at precisely the right time - the Great Plan may be advanced.
Contemplation is the path to alignment, to the correct interpretation of the Great Plan.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -15
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: All shall be one, as it is written.
Through millennia of study, total mastery over magic may be attained.
The Mage-Priest's thought patterns are so alien that they are even beyond the perception of enemy Wizards.
Cold, merciless, without pity, obeying only logic. Hardened against magic's ill-effects.
Within the Slann's gaze shines the cold-blooded scrutiny of the Old Ones.
When wounded, the Slann's sheer force of will literally recombines his body.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Shem's Burning Gaze"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Shem's Burning Gaze Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Shem's Burning Gaze Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pha's Protection"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pha's Protection Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pha's Protection Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Light of Battle"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Light of Battle Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Light of Battle Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Net of Amyntok"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Net of Amyntok Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Net of Amyntok Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Banishment Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Birona's Timewarp"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Birona's Timewarp Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Birona's Timewarp Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.
A long-serving member of an ancient, honourable tradition.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Saurus units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Saurus units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Saurus units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This seasoned warrior understands irregular combat perfectly: when to attack, when to hold back, when to withdraw behind heavier lines.

skillTree.localised_description: Only the finest beast riders can hang on whilst their mounts crash through the jungle undergrowth or smash through the foe's ranks.

skillTree.localised_description: It is a great honour to direct the elite warriors who protect the Plan from calamity.

skillTree.localised_description: The largest, most aggressive creatures - usually the oldest bulls of the herd - must be directed, lest their independent spirit lead them astray.

skillTree.localised_description: The unforgiving law of the jungle is most clear on matters of ascendancy.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +12% for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Magic resistance: 15% for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Braves who emerge from the same spawning often share a deep connection – a bond which provides considerable advantages in battle.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 15% for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units  (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units  (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Mount and rider, together as one at their very cores. Indivisible.

Melee attack: +5 for Cold One, Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, and Coatl units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: You need to be at the very centre of this pack of furious monsters to have the minutest chance of controlling their rage. Good luck!

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.
Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: The power generated by the overarching Geomantic Web can also be used to nourish the Saurus on the march.
This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.
Life in the jungle means knowing the difference between which flora can heal and what, if ingested, will kill you.
This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: So powerful is their affinity with the Winds that even a fourth generation spawning produces Slann with impressive spellcasting abilities.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +30
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Spawned via sacred rites, third generation Slann are adept at controlling the Winds of Magic to the Lizardmen's advantage.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +40
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Slann of this spawning generation are powerful magic-users able to command the Winds of Magic to their will.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(Lord's army)
